page.title: Ubiquiti Networks UniFi WiFi BaseStation XG (UWB-XG)

revision.text:

|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;; |flash1size = <!-- Size of flash --> |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Winbond;W632GU6KB-12; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Atheros;AR8033;AR8033-AL1A, NJ728224, 1728, CHINA; |eth2chip = AQuantia;AQR107;AQrate, AQR107-B0-EG, UAMP03002.S2, 245B-1726, KOREA; |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8511; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 10GbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/04/2018 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 1500 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07BSBSF7P |asin_country = DE |asin2 = B07DV8DGR3 |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->

|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Ubiquiti Networks 4X4-5GH |rad2modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9994;QCA9994, 0VV, NE646RG4, E064600; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
|rad3mod = Ubiquiti Networks 4X4-5GH |rad3modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad3chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9994;QCA9994, 0VV, NE646RG4, E064600; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = U.FL |rad3txchains = 4 |rad3rxchains = 4 |rad3sstreams = 4 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam3 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad3ac = 1733 |rad3n = 600 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5
|rad4mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad4modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad4chip1cpu = <!-- true, --> |rad4chip1 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad4chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad4chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad4oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad4_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad4txchains = 1 |rad4rxchains = 1 |rad4sstreams = 1 |rad4stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam4 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad4ac = <!-- 433, 867, 1300, 1733, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad4n = <!-- 150, 300, 450, 600, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad4a = <!-- 54, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad4freq = <!-- 2.4 or 5 or 6, Frequency band(s) of this radio -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== A fourth radio is visible in the FCC photos. It may be the "Dedicated Security Radio" :and/or a DFS channel monitor. It is 1x1:1 and connected via Mini PCIe.
==Links of Interest== [https://www.balticnetworks.com/docs/UniFi_WiFi_BaseStation_XG_DS.pdf Datasheet]
*[https://www.balticnetworks.com/ubiquiti-unifi-basestation-xg-quad-radio-802-11ac-wave2-black.html '''Ubiquiti Networks''' UniFi WiFi BaseStation XG (UWB-XG-BK)] :802.11ac, 4x4, 5GHz, Tri-Band, Wave 2, MU-MIMO
==See also== *[[Ubiquiti Networks UniFi AP]] *[[Ubiquiti Networks UniFi AP Pro]] *[[Ubiquiti Networks UniFi AP AC (UAP-AC)]] *[[Ubiquiti Networks UniFi AP Outdoor+ (UAP-Outdoor+)]] *[[Ubiquiti Networks UniFi WiFi BaseStation XG (UWB-XG)]]
